name: 乌丽安·塔蒂
awards: 2025年 第75届柏林国际电影节 新生代儿童单元 国际评审团最佳短片 (提名) 胡安妮塔
introduction: The Brazilian director and screenwriter was born in Curitiba and is now based in Barcelona, Spain. She studied film directing at the Escola de Cinema de Barcelona and journalism at the Universidade Positivo in Brazil. Her short film Anarchism at Two O’Clock screened at several international festivals. She is currently developing her debut feature film.
